android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.description: Allows an application to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

manifest_analysis.title: Launch Mode of Activity (com.unity3d.player.UnityPlayerActivity) is not standard.
manifest_analysis.desc: An Activity should not be having the launch mode attribute set to "singleTask/singleInstance" as it becomes root Activity and it is possible for other applications to read the contents of the calling Intent. So it is required to use the "standard" launch mode attribute when sensitive information is included in an Intent.
manifest_analysis.name: Launch Mode of Activity is not standard.

manifest_analysis.title:
Broadcast Receiver (com.google.firebase.iid.FirebaseInstanceIdReceiver) is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.
Permission: com.google.android.c2dm.permission.SEND
[android:exported=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: A Broadcast Receiver is found to be shared with other apps on the device therefore leaving it accessible to any other application on the device. It is protected by a permission which is not defined in the analysed application. As a result, the protection level of the permission should be checked where it is defined. If it is set to normal or dangerous, a malicious application can request and obtain the permission and interact with the component. If it is set to signature, only applications signed with the same certificate can obtain the permission.
manifest_analysis.name: is Protected by a permission, but the protection level of the permission should be checked.[android:exported=true]

playstore_details.title: Cruise Ship Driving US Police Transport Simulator
playstore_details.description:
Play.iO gives you brand new US Police Transport Cruise Ship Driving Simulator game to Simulate your world in a realistic 3D environment Get behind the wheels as a US Police Car Driver to transport jail prisoners to a high fi & big jail cells. Get behind the wheels of family apps to take care of your car in Simulate your world in Comics & manga All about your car driving games in US Police Cruise Ship Driving Simulator games on Google Play store. As you are much familiar that now-a-days car driving games and cruise ship driving simulator game has been in Trend but we (Play.iO) give you all new auto cruise police car 2019 ship driver cruise line real police plane games where you can not only cruise ship drive but speed boat simulator driving in US Police Cruise Ship Driver: Multi Transport Driving Simulator game as Drive big rig truck transport prisoners in Cruise ship simulator 2019. Get ready to serve as US Police transporter in US police cruise ship simulator transport prisoners. In this US police ship driving simulator game boat driving you will drive different cargo trucks, jeeps, helicopters, real police plane and police ship transporter in police games 2019. You are a real police car transporter of US police auto cruise line under water transporter who is ready to serve in this multitasking sim game of police transport prisoner. Act sharp and transport the military items to the destination on time. It is the most thrilling US Police Multi Transport Cruise Ship Driving Simulator game to Simulate you world in comics & manga in driving games All about your car & all thing sports to Race for glory transporter games where you will serve as American Police Transporter that will perform hard missions like driving trucks and jeeps, flying plane & flying helicopter from base to the military sea docks on Police Cruise Ship Multi Transport ship driving games. Your transportation duty is to drive jeeps, trucks, tanks and helicopters to the US police sea port that will be later transport to a different location through real cruise ship simulator. You will be serving as a captain of US police transport cruise ship driving game in this best of Police Cruise Ship Simulator: Driving Games Free.


US Police Transporter Cruise Ship Simulator Game 2019 fulfill the desire of three in one real simulation auto & vehicle thrill package like driving trucks games, flying helicopter games and sailing cruise ship games 2019. Load heavy trucks, buses, cars on cruise ship and safely transport games it through sea to US Police Headquarters on other island. Simulate your world in with the thrill of Real Police Cruise Ship Driving adventure games of best real ship simulator game & enjoy the excitement of driving games cruise ship & highly advanced transport ship in deep blue sea. Race for glory & entertain yourself through this train yourself to become professional ship captain or cruise ship sailor also real ship driver simulator. Fly helicopters on a cruise ship driving sailing on a sea mission. US Police Transporter game is going to be best police cruise ship driving simulator game where police car transport, helicopter flying mission & cruise ship driving games 2019 in all about your car gives you chance to show your police transporting skills in this Multi Transporter game i.e. US Police Cruise Ship Transport : Driving Simulator 2019


 US Police Cruise Ship Multi Transport: Driving Simulator Police Games 2019 Innovative Features
•	Amazing Police Cruise Ship, police car & police trucks
•	Transport prisoners to big jail cell in Police Cruise Ship Driving: US Transporter 2019
•	Realistic driving simulator controls of car truck & cruise ship with amazing sound effects
•	Best physics Easy controls in American Police Cruise Ship Simulator Games 2019
